name: Glorious PC Gaming Race Model D
description: Model D Wireless has the lowest wireless latency of any mouse in its class. The state-of-the-industry technology provides responsive, crisp clicks and no unexpected double-clicking.

name: Samsung 49-inch Odyssey G9 Gaming Monitor
description: Samsung's Largest 1000R Gaming Monitor: Get your head in the game with the 49 inch Odyssey G9, which matches the curve of the human eye, for maximum immersion and minimal eye strain, and the screen space of two 27 inch panels.

name: ASUS VG278Q 27-inch
description: 27-inch Full HD (1920x1080) Panel 144Hz refresh rate and 1ms (GTG) response time gaming monitor and free Sync/Adaptive Sync for a tear-free experience.

name: Sceptre 24-inch Professional Thin 75hz
description: 24-inch Ultra slim profile. Contemporary sleek metallic design

name: “Alienware 120Hz UltraWide Gaming Monitor 34 Inch
description: “Experience breathtaking views with a combination of immersive features

name: LG 27GN950-B Ultragear Gaming Monitor 27-inch UHD
description: The LG UltraGear is the first 4K Nano IPS 1ms gaming monitor that'll properly show off your superpowered GPU. This 4K 27-inch HDR monitor has a 144Hz refresh rate and 1ms response time, which is kind of wild for a 4K monitor. What is most impressive, however, is the Nano IPS tech that offers a wider color gamut and stellar viewing angles.

name: The Shogun The Mousepad Company DuraGlyde
description: Samurai fighting a water dragon

name: Razer Goliathus Extended Chroma Gaming Mousepad
description: Razer mousepad with RGB lights around the perimeter

name: Mouse Pad Wrist Support Keyboard Wrist Rest
description: Ergonomic mousepad with map of the Americas

name: Nets Basketball Large Rectangular Mousepad
description: Support the Brooklyn Nets with this mousepad!

name: Iron Man Mousepad
description: Iron man and arc reactor graphic mousepad

name: Logitech G502 Lightspeed Wireless
description: Game faster and more accurately with G502 LIGHTSPEED. Enter the iconic gaming mouse from Logitech G now with superfast LIGHTSPEED wireless, redesigned internals, and POWERPLAY compatibility.

name: Razer Viper Ultimate Gaming Mouse
description: Made to perform better than any wireless technology, the low latency delivers high-speed transmission to register swipes and clicks instantaneously. Its also highly adaptive, able to switch seamlessly between frequencies to maintain peak stability, allowing you the freedom to compete at your best.

name: Logitech MX Master 3
description: MX Master 3 is instant precision and infinite potential. Its the most advanced Master Series mouse yet, designed for creatives and engineered for coders. If you can think it, you can master it.

name: Logitech g600 MMO Gaming Mouse
description: With 20 buttons, the Logitech G600 MMO Gaming Mouse is the most customizable and easy-to-use mouse specifically designed for mastering your favorite MMOs

name: Logitech G513 Gaming Keyboard
description: G513 is a high performance LIGHTSYNC RGB mechanical gaming keyboard with choice of mechanical key switches and USB pass-through in a modern and sleek design

name: Razer BlackWidow V3 Gaming Keyboard
description: The name that started it all returns to reassert its dominance. Feel the difference with the Razer BlackWidow V3, backed by a legacy as the first and most iconic mechanical gaming keyboard, and armed with new, improved features including our world-renowned switches.

name: Corsair K100 Gaming Keyboard
description: The incomparable CORSAIR K100 RGB Optical-Mechanical Gaming Keyboard combines stunning aluminum design with per-key RGB lighting and a 44-zone LightEdge.

name: Logitech MX Keys
description: Introducing MX Keys, an advanced wireless illuminated keyboard featuring Perfect Stroke keys shaped for your fingertips, smart illumination, and a remarkably solid build

name: MacAlly Mini USB C Keyboard
description: Supports USB-C enabled computers, iPad Pro and Android devices. Compatible with USB-C equipped Chromebooks 78 full size thin keycaps for a comfortable and efficient typing experience 13 convenient shortcut keys for one-touch control of Mac applications.

name: Logitech c920x HD Pro Webcam
description: Full HD 1080p video calling and recording at 30 fps - You will make a strong impression when it counts with crisp, clearly detailed and vibrantly colored video.

name: NexiGo N60 1080P Web Camera
description: Powered by a 1080p FHD two-MP CMOS, the NexiGo N60 Webcam produces exceptionally sharp and clear videos at resolutions up to 1920 x 1080 with 30fps. The 3.6mm glass lens provides a crisp image at fixed distances and is optimized between 19.6 inches to 13 feet, making it ideal for almost any indoor use.

name: Logitech C270 HD Webcam
description: HD 720p video calling and HD video recording, 2.4 GigaHertz Intel Core2 Duo, 2 GB RAM,200 MB hard drive space

name: Logitech Brio 4k Webcam Ultra 4K HD
description: Ultra 4K HD resolution: 4 times the resolution of a typical HD webcam; look your best and enjoy professional video experience wherever you are with 5x HD zoom.

name: HOBFU 1080P Webcam with Microphone
description: Streaming IP webcam operates in 1080p video at 30-fps, whether you're on Skype or streaming yourself gaming delivers crystal clear images. Face enhancement technology automatically optimizes the image so you look more beautiful in the video.
